definition: Singles' Day (November 11), originally a day of activities for single people, but now also the world's biggest annual retail sales day

sentences.english: I think John's days as a bachelor are numbered.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲約翰打光棍的日子不會太久了。

sentences.english: "Singles day" shindig is a popular form of urban youth celebrate.
sentences.chinese: “光棍節”的熱鬧聚會是都市青年流行的慶祝形式。

sentences.english: Better a bachelor's life than a slovenly wife.
sentences.chinese: 過光棍生活，勝過有一個邋遢老婆。

sentences.english: Singles Day was first celebrated at  various universities in Nanjing, capital city of Jiangsu Province during the 1990s.
sentences.chinese: 光棍節最先在90年代的江蘇南京各大高校興起。

sentences.english: He is a bachelor; once he is fed no one is hungry in his family.
sentences.chinese: 他是光棍兒一條，一人喫飽全家不餓。

sentences.english: Accept the reality of being single.
sentences.chinese: 接受自己身爲光棍的現實。

sentences.english: The ones with the shorter ones are more likely to be bachelors.
sentences.chinese: 而那些具有短樣式的男人，則更可能會變成光棍。

sentences.english: It's the contemplation of this sort of thing that makes me deplore my fate in being a bachelor.
sentences.chinese: 就是想到這類事情才使我傷悼我這光棍漢的命運。

sentences.english: A few ruffian begin chummery make a target, only poor clever boy or long-standing.
sentences.chinese: 同宿舍幾個光棍開始搞對象了，唯有瘦猴還是老大難。

sentences.english: My brother met his girlfriend at a party on Singles' Day.
sentences.chinese: 我哥哥在光棍兒節聚會上遇到了他的女朋友。

sentences.english: I am already quite an old bachelor.
Early Images of Asian Men in Chinatown's "Bachelor Society".
sentences.chinese: 對華埠亞洲男性“光棍社會”的早期印象。

sentences.english: Becoming a successful single requires you to have confidence in yourself.
sentences.chinese: 想要升級爲成功光棍，你必須對自己信心十足。

sentences.english: Think about your prejudices towards being single. What negative thoughts do you have?
sentences.chinese: 想一想你對於光棍的偏見吧，有哪些負面的認識呢？

sentences.english: Optimism that I was a woman older girls plus early forties .
sentences.chinese: 樂觀地說，鄙人也就是個大齡少女外加早期女光棍。

sentences.english: I hear that it will rain tonight.
sentences.chinese: 光棍影院手機在線觀看我聽說今晚會下雨。

definition: Singles' Day (November 11), originally a day of activities for single people, but now also the world's biggest annual retail sales day
menfolk (collective term for men of different generations)/husbands and their fathers etc
"leftover woman" (successful career woman who has remained single)
lit. fifth child of the Wangs/bachelor
to marry and live with the bride's family (inverting traditional Chinese expectations)
